website_summaries.verdict: It looks good and its features are nice, but the Olympus Stylus 820's photos and performance simply aren't up to snuff.
pros: Perfect Shot Preview is a surprisingly useful feature
cons: overly soft pictures, especially at higher ISO settings

customer_reviews.title: The service from Bob's Cameras was great!
customer_reviews.text: The package arrived faster than expected and was packed with great care, with detailed information. I received bonus items from the that were very helpful and unexpected...I really appreciated it the thoughtfulness. The camera itself works as expected. Being that it was used, there was a little wear on it, some of the icons were rubbed off but overall, camera is in good condition.
customer_reviews.author: Winnie G

customer_reviews.title: Takes sharp pictures and easy to operate
customer_reviews.text: Nice, small , dependable camera. Takes nice sharp pictures, and probably the best thing about it for me is the ease of use. Minimal amount of knobs and buttons. I think the blue color looks much better in person then on the computer screen. It is more a metallic looking blue.
customer_reviews.author: lisa d

customer_reviews.title: Great Point-And-Shoot
customer_reviews.text: This camera is not a feature-rich as some of the competitors out there, but it is a great selection for a point-and-shoot. Holds a charge real well, small and easy to transport, large screen, easy to learn and use. Overall, this is a good choice for someone looking for their first point-and-shoot camera.
customer_reviews.author: TrippingBilly

customer_reviews.title: Nice camera for the price
customer_reviews.text: You have to use the auto function to get clear crisp pics. any other setting turns out blurring. This camera is very user friendly but not of high quality. You get was you pay for. This will work as a party camera but for more professional pics I would go with something else.
customer_reviews.author: Lobotomy

customer_reviews.title: This Camera is the coolest
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera for my girlfriend and she LOVES it. I had a chance to play with it several times and it has so many cool features that I didnt even know about. The view screen is large and easy to see. Pictures come out great. And the thing is waterproof to boot! I looked at several cameras at Best Buy and this one was thinner than most with a bigger screen. I bought it here on amazon because they are always cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Franklin P. Boyd

customer_reviews.title: Olympus stylus 820
customer_reviews.text: I love this camerea, I have had the same brand before and it is wonderful and easy to use. Just remember to buy an Olympus xd card for it, it does not come wit the camera.
customer_reviews.author: A. Sante

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: The only flaw that I have with the camera is the labeling on the turn wheel. It has worn off and I cannot tell when I turn it, where I am turning.
customer_reviews.author: K. Tutor

customer_reviews.title: Olympus Camera Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Olympus Camera for a Christmas present surpise for my son. It is GREAT and arrived in a timely manner! I was thrilled to receive it in time for Christmas for him. The only issue I had was that the memory card that I purchased separately from another individual got lost in the holiday mail and did not arrive until after New Year's. As always, I have great luck with my orders from Amazon!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Esther Austin

customer_reviews.title: The BEST camera for the $
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful, compact, powerful digital camera. It has 8 megapixels & 5x optical & 5x digital zoom. I did a lot of comparison shopping before purchasing this camera & overall, for the money, this one is the best. It is very easy to use & takes beautifully clear pictures.
customer_reviews.author: S. WOODS

customer_reviews.title: great camera
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my daughter in college.....she loves it. Great pics, and excellent zoom.
customer_reviews.author: C. Castillo

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves this cameral.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera for my daughter a year ago and never got around to doing a review. She loves. it.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Pretty much what I hoped for.
customer_reviews.text: This is the same camera I already owned; but accidentally damaged the lens. It was cheaper to buy this used camera, than to repair the old one. It looks and works just like my old one.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Very Good, BUT...
customer_reviews.text: Good camera. But the one thing I hate is that it brings A LOT of noise to most of the pictures. Even when I adjust the ISO... it's annoying sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: A. M. Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with the camera.
customer_reviews.text: This camera is easy to use and takes great pictures. Perfect for my needs. This is the 3rd Olympus camera I have owned. I consider myself a loyal customer.
customer_reviews.author: old mx rider

customer_reviews.title: Good, but...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great camera. I love the big screen and the photo quality that is consistent in just about any condition. However, I do have a few issues with it. I had the Stylus 710 (until it was stolen...) and replaced it with this one. Although it does have the 8 mega pixels, I just don't think that it would ever utilize that with a large enough print. To accommodate this feature, the camera is considerably bigger. All in all, though, it gets the job done and I definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: N. Grover

customer_reviews.title: A let down after my Canon
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera about 18 months ago. I had been using a Canon 2MP camera for years, but wanted something with higher resolution. I bought the camera because of its 5x Optical zoom, and good reviews. However, I found that the battery life was terrible, the image quality so-so, and the battery door plastic broke in my hands after about a year. I had been very careful with the camera too. I since replaced it with a modern Canon 10mp. The canon was actually cheaper and is simply a better camera. Great battery life, better image quality, and overall better construction.
customer_reviews.author: Bryce

customer_reviews.title: Look away!  Do NOT buy this hunk of junk!
customer_reviews.text: I take many many pictures and I absolutely HATE this camera. The only pics that come out barely average are the outside pics. The inside pics are dark and blurry. I have messed around with the settings and still cannot get any sort of improvement! Do NOT buy this camera. For what I have been readng you want the Fuji Finepix f40fd, the Cannon Powershot SD1000! I purchased the Fuji and so far LOVE it! The higher the ISO number, the better. Good luck! Happy shopping!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Horrible!!
customer_reviews.text: I have always had Olympus cameras and had good luck with them. However, purchasing this one was a huge mistake. Almost every picture comes out with a fog like appearance. I've changed the settings and played with it, to no avail. Do not waste your money!!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon P

customer_reviews.title: Image quality issues
customer_reviews.text: I have experienced very poor quality images especially indoors with the Stylus 820. Grainy and washed out images with camera in auto modes. Called tech support and only advice was to do a reset and now I have passed my 2 week period to return it, as it was a Christmas gift. Do not buy this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Airron09

customer_reviews.title: amazing
customer_reviews.text: this camera is amazing. can do anything with it, all sorts of lighting(including back lighting!!!), can stop movement(never get a blurry shot), and every photo comes out crystal clear. BUY this camera...you won't find better at this size and price
customer_reviews.author: AS

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I received this camera as a gift. I was highly disappointed when I had to return it because of poor image quality. The features available on this camera sounded fantastic, but I couldn't use them because 1 in 5 of my pictures was blury or out of focus. At 8 megapixels and a 5X optical zoom I should have had super clear pictures. I have owned 2 other Olympus cameras and have loved them, but I wanted something smaller. I was very disappointed to have to return this one. I exchanged it with a Canon Powershot and I love it!
customer_reviews.author: tlc

customer_reviews.title: nice little camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera is very small and easy to use. One of the features that we like about this camera is the speed of its processing and zoom features. The camera powers up quickly, zooms in and out quickly and snaps shot after shot with only a very brief pause between photos. Being 8 megapixel, it takes nice photos. We also like the large LCD display. The camera easily fits into a shirt or pant pocket and is very light. The display is bright, but not as bright as our last camera and thus why we did not give the camera a perfect 5 stars. Overall we are very pleased with the features and performance especially at the $200 pricepoint.
customer_reviews.author: J. Neal Clayton

customer_reviews.title: The Olympus 820 is crap - do not buy this piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: For 20 years I've been a user of the Olympus Stylus cameras first film and then a Stylus 410 (took on the appalachin Trail for 2100 miles). They were great! However beware!! This 820 is trash. Very, very poor quality pictures, even during the day. This company needs to repay folks for their purchase. They should not get away with putting out a product like this. There are too many folks that have the same poor quality that I have.
customer_reviews.author: Frank S. Urban

customer_reviews.title: Olympus camera - came quick and is great!
customer_reviews.text: This camera is small, lightweight, and takes wonderful pictures. It does have many functions which require reading the manual, however. Beyond that, it is user-friendly and its 5x zoom makes it one great little digital camera.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh Pittman

customer_reviews.title: Best 5 x zoom camera on the market.
customer_reviews.text: I have looked at lots of cameras over the past few weeks and this is definitely the best one for value, looks and simplicity. I wanted something bigger than my current Olypmus 3 x zoom but not bulkier, and this fit the bill without a doubt. With its image stabilisation 8.0 megapixels and 5 x zoom, this small camera had everything i was looking for. So easy to use and very light. For an amateur like me its awesome and fits in your purse without taking up too much room. Olympus have done it again!
customer_reviews.author: Z. A. Shadbolt

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The Stylus 820 has a short battery life, the inability to turn the power off while connected to the computer to conserve battery life, it locks-up while taking pictures requiring removal of the battery to restart, the images are often blurry even when using a tri-pod, and the cheap plastic battery cover broke the first week and had to be replaced. Crap! Crap! Crap!
customer_reviews.author: High Expectations

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera - fits everywhere & Great quality of pictures
customer_reviews.text: I recomend this camera!!! If you are looking for little one which can do great job. This is the one. Many different options to play with pictures, very easy and comfortable to use. I am so glad that I purchesed it. Looks great and works perfect. I love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for the money!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love my new camera. I have the Black Stylus 820 and it is not a large camera. In fact I was shocked how little it was compared to its other review. So far I couldn't be happier with it.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Nieuwsma

customer_reviews.title: olympus 820 camera
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this camera for Christmas. Powers up fast! View screen is bright, big and easy to read. Controls seem easy to understand. We have the Sony Cypershot and Canon ELF cameras also and the Olympus quickly became the family favorite with the Sony a close second.
customer_reviews.author: S. Fair

customer_reviews.title: Camera review
customer_reviews.text: It was sent within 2 days in perfect condition. I am now looking to order more electronics from this company, I am very pleased with them.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Poor Image Quality
customer_reviews.text: I had hoped for better. Even at its best quality, each image looks like it was shot in a snow storm. The noise is extreme and the compression destroys the rest of the image. If you are looking to shoot sharp, colorful, and print quality images from this camera, consider something else!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher G

product_meta.title: Olympus Stylus 820 8MP Digital Camera with 5x Optical Zoom (Red)
product_meta.description: Color:RedShoot in rain or shine, at the beach or on the slopes. Sealed and coated in all the right places, the Stylus 820 resists water, snow and dust. It's amazing to see 5x optical zoom in a digital camera this thin. Previewing, composing, shooting and sharing are so much easier and more enjoyable with this bright, premium-sized 2.7 inch HyperCrystal LCD.
feature_bullets: 8.0-megapixel CCD captures enough detail for photo-quality 16 x 22-inch prints
2.7-inch HyperCrystal LCD; Bright Capture technology for low-light photos
All-weather body with seals and gaskets to protect from rain, snow, or sand
Powered by one Li-Ion rechargeable battery (battery and charger included); stores images on xD Picture Cards (not included)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 2.7 out of 5 stars44 ratings2.7 out of 5 stars
